item.title: Dividable without remainder
item.description: Summary Problem For a “1 in n sampling” problem I was looking for a fast way to determine, if a value x (random number) is dividable by a previously known divisor d (sampling rate) without remainder. So the algorithm has to result with true in 1 of d cases, otherwise with false. x and d are both unsigned integers, in my case 32 bit long.
